iep_goals: Produce clear speech sounds for /r/, /l/, and /th/ in conversational speech with 80% accuracy
Follow 2-step classroom directions independently in 9 out of 10 trials
accommodations: Repeat and rephrase instructions as needed
Allow extra processing time for verbal responses
Use visual cues to support verbal instructions
learning_styles: needs additional processing time for language

interviews.parent: Parent reports Jayden is social and friendly but sometimes has trouble being understood by others.
interviews.teacher: Jayden tries hard to participate but often needs clarification of instructions.

observations.psychologist: Average cognitive functioning with specific deficits in language processing and articulation.
